entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Greenstone (Beardmore)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:39 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
